subject: Experienced and Affordable Laser Vision Correction.
body:
LasikPlus : 18 Months Financing : LasikPlus Vision Centers : 866-336-4995















ULTIMATE AFFORDABILITY!
Because You Want Excellent Results at an Affordable Price.
 NOT A CENT UPFRONT!
No down payment keeps more money in your pocket,
more flexibility in your budget.
NOT A PENNY OF INTEREST!
It?s almost like paying cash, except now you have
18 months to s-t-r-e-t-c-h your payments.
 BITE-SIZED PAYMENTS!
Your interest-free payments could be as little as
$41.94 per month. And it?s a cinch to qualify.







LASIK Counselors Available
Mon-Fri: 7 am - 12 am EST
Saturday: 8 am - 12 am EST
Sunday: 9 am - 8 pm EST















Proven Experience LASIK is all we do, with over 700,000 procedures since 1991.

FREE LASIK Vision Exam Get a complete LASIK vision exam at no charge or obligation.

Multiple LASIK Technologies Ensures optimized results by matching your eyes to the
precise LASIK technology ? including Custom Wavefront.

Climate-Controlled Treatment Center Promotes a better outcome by controlling humidity and temperature.


















?2007 LCA-Vision Inc. Offer is subject to credit approval. No finance 
charges will be assessed if the amount in full is paid by the due date. A minimum monthly payment of 3% of the balance is 
required. Other financing options are available. Call for details.

FL Residents only:  The patient and any other person responsible for payment has a right to refuse pay, cancel payment, or be 
reimbursed for payment for any other service, examination, or treatment that is performed as a result of and within 72 hours 
of responding to the advertisement for the free, discounted fee, or reduced fee service, examination, or treatment.

To unsubscribe from 
      future correspondence from LCA, please click here for us to remove you.
LCA-Vision, Inc / LasikPlus is located at 7840 Montgomery Road, Cincinnati, OH 45236.






Use this link to be automatically removed from any future offers


If you do not wish to receive any more offers from via e-mail, please write us with your removal request.  Customer Service 560- A F ST #438 Grants Pass, OR 97528.Please note: It may take up to 3 days for your name to be removed from our list.
